KozmicLuis
topLevelComment.text:
In clojure (lisp for the JVM):

(defn is-jolly-jumper? [numbers]
  (let [pair-differences (->> numbers (partition 2 1) (map #(Math/abs (apply - %))) set)
       range-set (->> numbers (count 1) set)]
    (= pair-differences range-set)))
